Text.dialogue: Heey! Have you ever tought of how much traffic makes us stressed, polutes the environment and how to solve this?
The humans are in a constant seek for renewable and clean energy to power up our lives and mantain a sustainable world for upcoming generations
Maglev is like a train, but it only requires magnetic and electric force to run,reducing the usage of oil,coal and natural gas, making the air quality better
Let me show how all those magnets and electricity works, so we can build more <color=#c8d45d>environmental-friendly</color> transportation around the world
